tool_description: A Spring Boot API that stores 13108 Kanji characters. The records contain each kanji's meanings, possible readings in both kana and romaji, the number of strokes, JLPT level, Jyoyo Grade and newspaper frequency if applicable.
name: MuzukanjiAPI
title: MuzukanjiAPI

api_list.name: Kanji Details
api_list.description: It displays the details of a kanji selected from the list.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://muzukanjiapi.p.rapidapi.com/kanji/655"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "muzukanjiapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://muzukanjiapi.p.rapidapi.com/kanji/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "muzukanjiapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Paginated Kanji List
api_list.description: It displays a paginated list of all kanji in the database. It can be filtered using the listed request parameters.
